title: 1.2 Master Challenge 2
question: Draw the blocks you will need to get the following output: When the is (Green Flag) clicked, the cat should first move 5 steps to the left, then 5 steps to the right, and then 7 steps to the left again.?

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
